parameters.content:
## Input Expected

{
  "timestamp": "2025-10-25T...",
  "source": "LinkedIn Content Magician",
  "originalPrompt": "user input",
  "generatedContent": "AI-generated post",
  "ragSources": ["source1", "source2", ...],
  "contentMetrics": {
    "characterCount": 450,
    "wordCount": 85,
    "hashtags": 3,
    "emojis": 8
  },
  "platform": "linkedin",
  "contentType": "post",
  "status": "ready_for_review"
}

## Output Generated

{
  ...inputData,
  "releasePrompts": {
    "textPrompts": [5 prompts],
    "imagePrompts": [5 prompts],
    "videoPrompts": [3 prompts],
    "marketingPrompts": [2 prompts],
    "usageTips": [array]
  },
  "status": "release_prompts_generated"
}

## LinkedIn Content Magician with Release Prompts
* Receives structured input with timestamp, original prompt, and content metrics
* Uses AI Agent to generate LinkedIn post content
* Leverages RAG sources for content enhancement
* Validates content metrics (character count, hashtags, emojis)
* Generates comprehensive release prompts for multi-platform content:
  - üìù Text Content (5 types): Carousel, Twitter Thread, Blog, Video Script, Newsletter
  - üé® Image Generation (5 types): Hero Image, Infographic, Carousel Slides, Quote Graphics, Thumbnail
  - üé• Video Content (3 types): Short-form, YouTube, Tutorial
  - üìà Marketing (2 types): Social Campaign, Landing Page
* Sends notification with full content statistics and prompt counts
* Returns ready-for-multi-platform-release status
